name: @kokorolx/ai-sandbox-wrapper
description: Docker-based security sandbox for AI coding agents. Isolate Claude, Gemini, Aider, and other AI tools from your host system.
author: kokorolx

scripts.test: node bin/cli.js help && bash -n setup.sh && echo '✅ All tests passed'
scripts.lint: bash -n setup.sh && bash -n lib/*.sh && echo '✅ Shell scripts valid'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run lint:js && npm run test
